title: State cooperative banks in Punjab to offer loans on crop residue management machines
description: Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann announced a new loan scheme from state cooperative banks for farmers to buy crop residue management machines. The scheme offers 80% subsidy to PACs and 50% subsidy to farmers on equipment purchases. It aims to reduce paddy straw burning by making rural credit more accessible.
